name: CrashClinicXubuntu_x86
short_description: This disk is based off of Xubuntu Precise x86 and contains packages for quick testing of computer hardware.  It has good wifi support on the first boot for most chipsets, a stress test application, a memtester, a hardware diagnosis program, chrome browser with flash for testing audio/video/network/webcam.  Also contains an antivirus program and several data recovery tools.  Uses the XFCE window manager and runs in as little as 256 mb of ram!  Includes an installer to install as an fully functioning operating system.  Also includes a written guide for using the disk [on the desktop when you boot it up]  Free to distribute under GNU public license.
summary: A Live DVD for Computer hardware diagnosis
